      • processXml

        public abstract java.lang.String processXml​(java.io.InputStream inputStream,
                                            MultipartDto multipartDto)
                                     throws java.io.IOException,
                                            javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                                            org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                            javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
        DocumentBuilderFactory.setNamespaceAware(boolean) true is crucial for getting Node.getLocalName()!
        Parameters:
        inputStream - An xml file (kml, gpx etc) as the InputStream from a given MultipartDto
        multipartDto - The main object to get data from.
        Returns:
        A fully processed xml string.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
        org.xml.sax.SAXException
        javax.xml.transform.TransformerException

      • getDocument

      • writeTransformedDocument

        protected java.lang.String writeTransformedDocument​(org.w3c.dom.Document document,
                                                    boolean prettyPrint)
                                             throws javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
        Parameters:
        document - Document to be transformed into String.
        prettyPrint - To format the resulting xml String with indents.
        Returns:
        String where 1) All Transformer linebreaks as "\r\n" are replaced with default "\n" 2) As Locus may spread orphan signs ">" occasionally (especially after <ExtendedData> tag) before returning the resulting String is checked with ">\t" regexp (or '\\s*>\\s*' within original kml for those signs to be deleted.
        Throws:
        javax.xml.transform.TransformerException - When xml is not valid

      • trimWhitespaces

        void trimWhitespaces​(org.w3c.dom.Node node)
        Deletes all whitespaces between all nodes deep recursively from the given Node
        Parameters:
        node - The root Node whose all the children should be cleared from whitespaces between
